column5: The last two days I was staying at a buddies place around the GTA who just happens to have a body of water running less than 2 minutes behind his house. Seeing as I already had my fishing stuff in my car, I talked him into coming down with me and wetting a line. I was using light spinning gear, and tossed an assortment of very small lures. We caught some fish, and I ended up hooking into my PB steelhead - a beauty 28 incher. I had an absolute blast, but I gotta get ready for the cottage this weekend, it's gonna be great. Enjoy the pics.
Nice catch! Congrats on the PB! Don't you just love how we got such good fishing at home.
nice job. i guess there are some still kickin around
yup.. a few still kickin around..
